===pr6.txt====
0010|10|12,  MOV R1, 12

ADD R1, 8 == MOV R2, 8    ADD R1, R2
0010|11|8,   MOV R2, 8 
0100|0000|10|0000|11, ADD R1, R2 


MUL R1, 4   == MOV R2, 4    MUL R1, R2
0010|11|4,  MOV R2, 4 
0110|0000|10|0000|11, MUL R1, R2 

DIV R1, 2   == MOV R2, 2    DIV R1, R2 
0010|11|2,  MOV R2, 2
0111|0000|10|0000|11,  DIV R1, R2 

SUB R1, 3 == MOV R2, 3   SUB R1, R2
0010|01|3,  MOV R2, 3 
0101|0000|10|0000|01,  SUB R1, R2

0000000000000000  HLT



~~~~~~PR2.TXT~~~~~~~
0010|10|0  MOV R1, 0

ADD R1, 1 ---- MOV R3, 1   ADD R1, R3
0010|01|1  MOV R3, 1
0100|0000|10|0000|01  ADD R1, R3

ADD R1, 2 ---- MOV R3, 2   ADD R1, R3
0010|01|2  MOV R3, 2
0100|0000|10|0000|01  ADD R1, R3

ADD R1, 3 ---- MOV R3, 3   ADD R1, R3
0010|01|3  MOV R3, 1
0100|0000|10|0000|01  ADD R1, R3

ADD R1, 4 ---- MOV R3, 4   ADD R1, R3
0010|01|4  MOV R3, 1
0100|0000|10|0000|01  ADD R1, R3

0000000000000000   HLT

0010|10|0010110000,  MOV R1, adr_br

0010|01|0011000000,  MOV R3, adr_br

0100|0000|10|0000|01,  ADD R1, R3

0010|01|0011010000,  MOV  adr_br

0100|0000|10|0000|01,  ADD R1, R3

0010|01|0011100000,  MOV  adr_br

0100|0000|10|0000|01,  ADD R1, R3

0010|01|0011110000,  MOV adr_br

0100|0000|10|0000|01,  ADD R1, R3


0000000000000000, 
0000000000000000, 

		podaci zapisani u binarnoj osnovi
0000000000000000,  == 0
0000000000000001,  == 1 
0000000000000010,  == 2
0000000000000011,  == 3 
0000000000000100   == 4
-------------------------------
pr3.txt


2=001100|0000,  12

36=001001|0000, 9

3=001010|0000, 10 

4=001011|0000} 11


[
MOV R1, 36
0010|10|36,
0010|10|0010010000
 
MOV R2, 3
0010|11|3,
0010|11|0010100000 

DIV R1, R2
0111|000010|000011, 
0111|000010|000011

MOV R3, 4
0010|01|4,
0010|01|0010110000

MUL R1, R3
0110|000010|000001, 
0110|000010|000001

MOV R3, 2
0010|01|2,
0010|01|0011000000

DIV R1, R3
0111|000010|000001,
0111|000010|000001

HLT 
0000000000000000]

0000000000000000    DODATNO


0000000000100100     36 NA 9-OM
0000000000000011     3 NA 10-OM
0000000000000100     4 NA 11-OM
0000000000000010     2 NA 12-OTM
